text: {{(() => { const capacity = Number(inpCapacity.text) || 1; const changeover = Number(inpChangeover.text) || 0; const data = getCuttingList.data || []; const schedule = getSawSchedule.data || []; const rateM3PerMin = capacity / 480; if (schedule.length === 0) return 'No saw schedule configured â€” add working days on the Saw Schedule page'; if (data.length === 0) return 'No items in cutting list'; const days = schedule.map(d => { const dateStr = String(d.schedule_date).substring(0, 10); const start = new Date(dateStr + 'T' + d.start_time + ':00'); const end = new Date(dateStr + 'T' + d.end_time + ':00'); return { start, availMins: (end - start) / 60000 }; }); let dayIdx = 0; let dayElapsed = 0; let lastFinish = null; let unscheduled = 0; data.forEach((row, idx) => { const prev = idx > 0 ? data[idx - 1] : null; const changeoverMins = (prev && (row.timber !== prev.timber || row.profile !== prev.profile)) ? changeover : 0; const itemMins = Number(row.volume_m3) / rateM3PerMin; const totalNeeded = changeoverMins + itemMins; while (dayIdx < days.length && dayElapsed > 0 && dayElapsed + totalNeeded > days[dayIdx].availMins) { dayIdx++; dayElapsed = 0; } if (dayIdx >= days.length) { unscheduled++; return; } dayElapsed += changeoverMins + itemMins; lastFinish = new Date(days[dayIdx].start.getTime() + dayElapsed * 60000); }); const totalChangeovers = data.filter((r, i) => i > 0 && (r.timber !== data[i-1].timber || r.profile !== data[i-1].profile)).length; let totalMins = 0; data.forEach((row, idx) => { if (idx > 0 && (row.timber !== data[idx-1].timber || row.profile !== data[idx-1].profile)) totalMins += changeover; totalMins += Number(row.volume_m3) / rateM3PerMin; }); let result = lastFinish ? ('Est. Finish: ' + String(lastFinish.getDate()).padStart(2,'0') + '/' + String(lastFinish.getMonth()+1).padStart(2,'0') + '/' + lastFinish.getFullYear() + ' ' + String(lastFinish.getHours()).padStart(2,'0') + ':' + String(lastFinish.getMinutes()).padStart(2,'0')) : 'All items unscheduled'; result += '   (' + data.length + ' cuts, ' + totalChangeovers + ' changeovers, ' + Math.round(totalMins) + ' mins total'; if (unscheduled > 0) result += ', ' + unscheduled + ' unscheduled'; result += ')'; return result; })()}}
